alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Loving; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:03AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LEA...WESTERN ANDREWS...WINKLER AND NORTHEASTERN LOVING COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM CDT/1145 PM MDT/... At 1203 AM CDT/1103 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Eunice Airport to 16 miles northwest of Wink. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kermit, Eunice, Jal, Wink, Jal Airport, Eunice Airport, Bennett, Frankel City, Slash Ranch, Oil Center, and Winkler County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
